text: 14.19: Mt 15.35-39 naŋga, Mk 8.6-10Kamatɨhu Jisas krunavundiŋ ambahi tɨpa hañɨ mɨnzɨmu. Kamatɨhu mavatɨmba arɨkita arɨkita kwɨrɨ naŋga asa arɨkita haŋɨnɨŋ mɨŋata, kɨmba nɨmbu kuta yahuta Gotɨŋ kuyu avivi ŋgumi. Kamata mɨŋasɨhɨraramata nuŋandɨ sɨmbɨrasaraŋ ŋguhi krunavundiŋ tɨŋgɨrumu.Jisas 5,000 kruŋ ñaña ŋgumi
